abstract: A rebel investor, Knight Vinke Asset Management, renewed its attack on HSBC‘s management over the weekend, criticizing its treatment of shareholders as “truly irresponsible,” according to The Telegraph.
lead_paragraph: A rebel investor, Knight Vinke Asset Management, renewed its attack on HSBC‘s management over the weekend, criticizing its treatment of shareholders as “truly irresponsible,” according to The Telegraph.

headline.main: Knight Vinke Renews Attack on HSBC Strategy
